messages.messageBody:
http://www.PetitionOnline.com/UKSwords/petition.html

Clive -
your post as you may know was cross-posted to the Samurai-history
list and the above link came from another member. For your
edification gentlemen a petition, with some great comments, I invite
you all to sign it...
-t
